name: MULTI PONG IFICATION - GMTK 2021
description:
If you do not see the paddles try playing in fullscreen :: If problem persists leave a comment with your screen resolution. CONTROLS:

UP / DOWN ARROW KEYS :: Moves Paddles Up and Down

LEFT / RIGHT ARROW KEYS :: Rotates Paddle Left and Right

Every 5 points: A new Ball will be added and tied to the latest one, forming a chain.

You get a point for every Ball+Paddle Collision.

CURRENT HIGHSCORE: 4013 PointsPlease Leave a Comment and/or Rate the Game it will mean a lot to me! About:

Made in One day for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam because my first Idea didn't turn out to well.

Bugs:

- Lack Of Action Detection doesn't always work - Forcing you to Restart the Game.
